description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
Features
PDFNET-43759 Implement LaTeX fragment embedding
PDFNET-41246 Support to add text with Gradient Fill
PDFNET-38710 HorizontalAlignment for FloatingBox contents

Enhancements
PDFNET-42444 Use SVG image with StampAnnotation objecе

Bugs

PDFNET-38484 Long text replacement moves text off the page

PDFNET-43613 PDF to PPTX - Highlighted text do not appear properly in resultant file
PDFNET-42510 PDF to HTML - Text appears as image
PDFNET-42595 PDF to HTML - Text changes its position
PDFNET-43463 PDF to HTML - the additional characters are added
PDFNET-42573 Changing Foreground color of Text removes the image from the PDF
PDFNET-34368 TextState Forground does not work
PDFNET-36215 Setting BackgroudColor property of text Fragment hides the text
PDFNET-39021 Text replacement loses some characters in replaced text

PDFNET-43657 Burmese language character are cut from above ages when adding in PDF
PDFNET-38149 Text Extraction issue: RTL text is rendered as LTR
PDFNET-37834 PDF to TIFF: conversion loses data
PDFNET-42762 HTML to PDF - Problem converting PDF file
PDFNET-38837 Incorrect Annotation type being returned
PDFNET-43518 Bookmarks are lost after merging PDF documents
PDFNET-43598 Exception when trying to set border for RadioButtonField

PDFNET-41794 PDF to DOC: text line missing
PDFNET-41510 PDF to Doc: Text in the word document are wrapped one on another
PDFNET-40505 PDF to XPS: colored images changes to greyscale
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
